name: Five Nights With Firing 1. The worst game.
name_original: Five Nights With Firing 1. The worst game.
description:
This is a parody of stick it to the stickman. I don't own anything from them.

Story:

Well.. after beating financial offices you saw a mysterious newspaper... Theres not that much to it but I'd doubt its anything good. but you woke up.. and now you see yourself, in front of the office building... Somebody must've kidnapped you. survive for at least one night..... At Financial offices. Because I have clickteam fusion 2.5 free edition.

  1. story
  2. now, the characters
  3. movement
  4. easter eggs.
Characters: * Red Stickman| 
* Blue Stickman|
* ???| Movement: Blue stickman: goes to lobby and starts in cam 1 supply office. then goes to the entrance / guard. Red stickman: starts in cam 3 2nd floor and runs to the entrance. ???: ???. Well... Heres the rooms: cam 1 supply closet
cam 2 lobby
cam 3 2nd floor cam 1
1st frame entrance
2nd behind you is the cameras
thats it. THE END! Easter Eggs:

* a lot

* menu easter egg.

The End. gamejolt account is: Ultimate_Fun_Guy!. Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC656-73tecD1pkFdgIi2PPw thanks for reading and playing! - froggy plush.
